trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl" /> class is an abstract class from which concrete text-based controls are derived.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl" /> 基类是一个抽象类，基于文本的具体控件都从该类派生。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> controls are examples of controls derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Label>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>控件是控件派生自的示例<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl>类。

trans-unit.source: Every control that is based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> class has a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property, which can be programmatically modified.
trans-unit.target: 基于每个控件<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl>类具有<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>属性，可以以编程方式修改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property is usually used to render the control.
for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the text for the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置或返回控件的文本。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: For an object that inherits the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl> class, this property renders the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 有关继承的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>属性从<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl>类，此属性呈现控件的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property can be specified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> attribute, or as inner text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>属性可以通过使用指定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>属性，或为内部文本。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>中这两种方式指定属性，则内部文本始终优先。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the newly set property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A>属性以编程方式设置，则内部文本将会自动删除，并且已设置新属性优先。
